snippet: Hinkie, who ran an analytics-minded front office, had his power weakened in December when the 76ers hired Jerry Colangelo as chairman of basketball operations....
lead_paragraph: Hinkie, who ran an analytics-minded front office, had his power weakened in December when the 76ers hired Jerry Colangelo as chairman of basketball operations.
abstract: Philadelphia 76ers general manager Sam Hinkie resigns after three straight losing seasons; other pro basketball news noted.

headline.main: Sam Hinkie Quits as 76ers’ General Manager
